meanings.definition: A device that uses X-rays to produce real-time images of the internal structures of a patient's body.
meanings.sent1: Doctors use fluoroscopes to see inside the body during surgeries.
meanings.sent2: The hospital purchased new fluoroscopes to improve diagnostic capabilities.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to hide from the vet by sneaking into the fluoroscope room.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like fluoroscopes, seeing through every lie he told.
meanings.sent5: The fluoroscopes hummed softly as they revealed the secrets hidden within.

meanings.definition: To examine or treat a patient using a fluoroscope.
meanings.sent1: The doctor fluoroscopes the patient to determine the cause of the pain.
meanings.sent2: She carefully fluoroscopes each patient to ensure accurate diagnosis.
meanings.sent3: The clown tried to make the patient laugh while being fluoroscoped.
meanings.sent4: His words fluoroscoped her heart, revealing the hidden emotions within.
meanings.sent5: Fluoroscoping requires precision and skill to avoid unnecessary exposure to radiation.
